keyword: how many calories is in saltine crackers
title: How Many Calories in Saltine Crackers?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in saltine crackers for a standard serving of 5, plus carbs, sodium, full nutrition breakdown, and serving tips.
h1: How Many Calories in Saltine Crackers?
assumptions: Standard plain saltine crackers (e.g., Nabisco); serving of 5 crackers ≈16g; no toppings or added fats.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, size, and freshness. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A serving of 5 saltine crackers provides about 70 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Spread 1/2 tsp cream cheese per cracker
Top with 1 tsp peanut butter per cracker

faqs.q: How many calories is in one saltine cracker?
faqs.a: About 14 kcal per single saltine cracker.

faqs.q: How many saltine crackers in a standard serving?
faqs.a: Typically 5 crackers per serving, totaling ~70 kcal.

faqs.q: Are saltine crackers high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, 5 crackers have ~280 mg sodium; opt for low-sodium if watching intake.

faqs.q: Do saltine crackers have any protein or fiber?
faqs.a: Minimal: ~1 g protein and 0.5 g fiber in 5 crackers.

faqs.q: How many calories in a full sleeve of saltine crackers?
faqs.a: A sleeve (≈40-50 crackers) has 560-700 kcal; portion control recommended.
